org.apache.gravitino

Interface Auditable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Catalog, Fileset, Group, Metalake, Role, Schema, Table, Tag, Topic, User
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CatalogDTO, FilesetDTO, GravitinoMetalake, GroupDTO, MetalakeDTO, RoleDTO, SchemaDTO, TableDTO, TagDTO, TopicDTO, UserDTO

    @Evolving
public interface Auditable
    An auditable entity is an entity that has audit information associated with it. This audit information is used to track changes to the entity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Audit auditInfo() 

    • Method Detail

      • auditInfo

        Audit auditInfo()
        Returns:
        The audit information of the entity.
